Question: Pinterest CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Pinterest

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Hyper-engaged Gen Z target audience
- Product innovation with industry-leading AI
- Enhanced ad performance capabilities
- Annual Pinterest Predicts report with latest consumer trends for 2024
- Insights into upcoming trends in food, beauty, home, fashion, and travel sectors
Summary_cn:
Pinterest

CES 2024 产品重点

- 高度参与的 Z 世代目标受众
- 行业领先的人工智能产品创新
- 增强的广告表现能力
- 每年推出的《Pinterest 预测报告》提供 2024 年最新消费趋势
- 揭示食品、美容、家居、时尚和旅行行业即将出现的趋势洞察
